summary: This context block provides the high-level summary and references for the NormCode AI Planning Pipeline meta-algorithm. The full, detailed context is stored in the referenced files within the context_store directory.

sections.title: Core Methodology and Examples
sections.description: The primary methodology is a four-phase pipeline (Confirmation, Deconstruction and Plan Formalization, Contextualization, Materialization). A complete, practical walkthrough of this pipeline, including the illustrative 'user registration flow' example, detailed phase descriptions, and guiding principles, is provided in raw_context_prompt.txt. This document also contains the overall project goal.

sections.title: Technical Language Specification
sections.description: The underlying semi-formal language used in the plan is NormCode. The complete technical reference for the language, including its syntax, concept types, data storage model (`Reference`), and execution logic (`Agent's Sequences` and `Orchestrator`), is detailed in raw_context_normcode_terminology_guide.txt.

sections.title: Automated Translation Process
sections.description: The set of prompts and meta-plans that define the automated translation from natural language to NormCode is documented in raw_context_normcode_translation_guide.txt.

sections.title: File Format Specifications
sections.description: The specifications for the various file formats used throughout the pipeline (.txt, .json, .ncd, .ncn, .nc) are detailed in raw_context_file_formats_guide.txt.
